entrees.name: Shawarma
entrees.description: Tender slices of slow roasted, seasoned chicken with choice of vegetables and spreads, served in pita bread or lafa.

entrees.name: Kebab
entrees.description: Grilled skewers of seasoned ground beef or lamb with choice of vegetables and spreads, served in pita bread or lafa.

entrees.name: Falafel
entrees.description: Falafel balls with choice of vegetables and spreads, served in pita.
